title: Web Development Crash Course – ACM
description: A hands-on crash course where I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Tailwind, and React.js. I built multiple responsive projects, from portfolios to single-page applications, improving my problem-solving and clean coding skills.

title: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency – UCP
description: A comprehensive course covering blockchain fundamentals, cryptocurrencies, smart contracts, and decentralized applications. I gained practical exposure to Ethereum, wallets, and real-world blockchain use cases across industries.
